plot outline: This fast-paced action drama follows the fluctuating fortunes in the life of a car thief, who pretends to be a wealthy businessman in order to impress the woman he loves. When they make plans to marry, he decides to join one last dangerous mission in order to ensure a happy future.
title: Vasool Raja
plot: This fast-paced action drama follows the fluctuating fortunes in the life of a car thief, who pretends to be a wealthy businessman in order to impress the woman he loves. When they make plans to marry, he decides to join one last dangerous mission in order to ensure a happy future.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
